channel.title: Symbols on my hat?
channel.description:
I have come to be somewhat curious about what these 2 symbols on the bill of my hat mean. I don't know if they are Chinese or Japanese, all i know is its on a hat lol. I dont even know where i would look something like this up.
1 symbol is on the left (easy to see) and the other is on the fan (a bit harder) [img]http://true-programas.netii.net/images/hatsyms.jpeg[/img]

item.title: Symbols on my hat?
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

CoonHunter:

Lol’d i wont be able to sleep anyways. I have a sleeping ‘disorder’. If i start thinking about something before i sleep (almost ALWAYS happens -.-) then i will break it down, and try to figure it out in my head before waking up the next day (or the usual, later that morning). Typically though i have to get up, and make a basic form of my idea before my mind is settle again. My mind travels alot, and i was told thats a mental disorder, but idk. (possibly ADD?)

I always take my NDS and play GTA then I get tired and sleep (I play it in my bed thats why a NDS is nice). Then you dont have to think about something. My parents say read a book before going bed, thats just bullshit, books are lame).

Read full topic

item.title: Symbols on my hat?
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

CoonHunter:

Yea, to be honest, I’m thinking about taking it up to the ‘flea market’ about 20 minutes from me. There is a Chinese women up there, and she speaks fairly good English, so I’m thinking about asking, or even paying her to tell me.

Coonhunter, I should go to her or else I think you can’t sleep tonight… Until you know it.

Read full topic

item.title: Symbols on my hat?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

None, but i got it from my G’Ma a while back, she had found it and thought it looked cool. 2 days later, (this since X’Mas), it has now become my favorite hat.
